subject: Empanelment of Safety Consultant for all highway projects under NHAI- An Interim list of empanelled safety consultants in continuation to circular no. 12.21/2020 dated 19.06.2020 and12.24/2022 dated 13.01.2022

No. 176634)} Sub:: Empanelment of Safety Consultant for all highway projects under NHAI- An Interim list of empanelled safety consultants in continuation to circular no. 12.21/2020 dated 19.06.2020 and 12.24/2022 dated 13.01.2022- reg: It is informed that the RFP for inviting proposals for Empanelment of Road Safety Consultants was floated on e-tender portal on 27.05.2022 with extended due date as 05.07.2022 and Technical Bid Opening date as 06.07.2022. In response of which 106 bids by 80 firm were received. The first round of evaluation of the bids has been carried out by the evaluation committee in accordance with RFP provisions and with the approval of Competent Authority, 22 teams f 17 firms were found to meet requisite criteria in the first round. 2 Accordingly, 17 firms having 22 teams are considered for empanelment as Safety Consultant (First interim list of firms and their team members is enclosed as Annexure A): The empanelment of these 17 firms/22 teams will add to the existing list of 53 teams already empanelled as Safety Consultants vide circular no. 12.21/2020 dated 19.06.2020 and 12.24/2022 dated 13.01.2022. 3_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority_ Encl:: As stated above o so1/23 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.)
